Posts.Content: That experience you've had you never mentioned ( at least not in answers to me ), and actually I would like to hear the exact things you experienced ( if you are willing to share them , and I guess you are , since you are on the HB, maybe just got tired of repeating ? ) Not just the statistics and words everything will be ok. You say, fibroid cysts, I never heard that before, so I don't know what kind of cysts are those. I had some " cancerous scare " in my life already ( cancerous colon polyp found just on time 14 years ago, found again last year, because I have my colonoscopies regularly ), (cancerous lesion found on my cervix on time 13 years ago ) so of course I'm afraid that this is my third kind of cancer scare, and I would like to do everything I can to find it on time if that's possible. I don't like exams, mammograms and biopsies, etc, either. I would like to just let it go , and believe when a dr. say it's probably nothing , but it's stronger than me , that PROBABLY is not good enough for me. Thank you again for your responses, I appreciate them.
Posts.Title: can you have a breast ultrasound even if a diagnostic mammogram doesn't show anything

Posts.Content: I have to go back in 6 months ( even if I don't do anything in the meantime ) so there is no end to my story yet.If nothing changes by then, back again in another 6 months, and all this by advise of the breast surgeon. Hopefully everything goes well.
Posts.Title: can you have a breast ultrasound even if a diagnostic mammogram doesn't show anything

Posts.Content: Can I request to have the breast ultrasound even if a diagnostic mammogram doesn't show anything suspicious ? Can the ultrasound pick up something what a diagnostic mammogram missed ? or only a breast MRI can do that ? I have a pain in my left breast / left armpit , but a diagnostic mammogram didn't show anything suspicious 2 years ago , the pain is still here ( on and off , sometimes dull sometimes sharp ) 2 weeks ago a screening mammogram was ok for the left side, but I'd like to ask for a diag. mammo and US.
Posts.Title: can you have a breast ultrasound even if a diagnostic mammogram doesn't show anything

Posts.Content: Just to avoid the confusion , the fibroadenoma and the complicated cysts I was writing about in my another thread are in my right breast without pain, the pain is in my left breast.
Posts.Title: can you have a breast ultrasound even if a diagnostic mammogram doesn't show anything

Posts.Content: I talked to the breast surgeon and she said a screening mammogram didn't show anything, I don't need and I can not have a diagnostic mammogram. Even when I told her my concern about the screening mammogram missing something because it's just a screening one. I asked her what she thinks about seeing an endocrinologist because I have pain in my armpit too, she said I don't need that either. I can't believe how confident is that dr. based on a screening mammogram only. I will seek a second opinion , but then I have to go out of their network, because I'm sure another dr. who works for the same hospital ( and probably know her ) won't say anything different no matter what. And I will see an endocrinologist too. I'm a person who worries for every little thing, but I couldn't forgive myself if I don't do everything I can.
Posts.Title: can you have a breast ultrasound even if a diagnostic mammogram doesn't show anything

Posts.Content: You probably forgot that you red in my post in another thread ( you did reply to that one too ) that I indeed had a 3D mammogram. I was hoping somebody with experience with all this would answer. I made an appointment with another breast surgeon to hear a second opinion. Thank you for your answer .
Posts.Title: can you have a breast ultrasound even if a diagnostic mammogram doesn't show anything

Posts.Content: was anyone called back for compression view mammo bc of density and distortion found on screening mammogram ? the report doesn't even say what kind of distortion it just say questionable. i'm going crazy bc i have 2 more weeks until the appoitment.
Posts.Title: called back for diagnostic mammogram

Posts.Content: Thanks for your answer ! But I was hoping somebody with the history of this kind a cyst would answer, because statistics are just that, numbers on a paper. I red about them , but I also red about women who thought they have only cysts, but they had much more and found out too late.
Posts.Title: complicated breast cysts , mammogram in 6 months ?

Posts.Content: I had a good news about the solid mass they found, it's a fibroadenoma confirmed by a core needle biopsy. but I have also complicated cysts versus cluster of cysts, one is 0.7 x 0.3 and the other one is 0.6 x 0.2 x 0.2 cm , and they are heterogeneously hypoechoic oval parallel masses, with no internal vascularity demonstrated. now that I red more about these cysts I'm worried why they didn't do a biopsy on them too. I'm afraid the 6 months it's too long to wait and see. All of these findings are in the right breast. I had the 3 D mammogram this year, our hospital is offering it as a new thing since last year. Anyone with complicated cyst ?
Posts.Title: complicated breast cysts , mammogram in 6 months ?

Posts.Content: someone with IBC, if you had the pain, how long did you have it and is it like on and off pain ? I have an on and off left breast and/or armpit pain since January this year, sometimes no pain for month or two then it comes back. I had a diagnostic mammogram, came back ok, but I read that mammo does not pick up this kind of BC. no other signs. I'll have a chest ct w/o the contrast tomorrow for follow up for a lung nodule, but ct is not going to show anything about the breast or armpit, right ?
Posts.Title: IBC-is pain constant or on and off ? dull, sharp ?

Posts.Content: By same things , you mean cysts or fibroadenomas ? and how are you monitored, and how often ?
Posts.Title: waiting for core needle biopsy results 1 2

Posts.Content: I had the core needle biopsy yesterday, it was a piece of cake, no pain at all during the procedure, and I feel good 24 hrs later, no bruising yet either so far. somehow I have this strange feeling, that this lump is a cancer. They said it's small 0.7x0.3x0.7 cm, but it's solid and it's a parallel lobulated mass with angular margins and there is adjacent vascularity demonstrated. I asked what is the most suspicious thing about this lump, they said the angular margins and because it's lobulated. When you get the results, do they tell you the grade, stage and those kind a things ?
Posts.Title: waiting for core needle biopsy results 1 2

Posts.Content: do you remember how big is it ? and how often do you have a mammogram, or do you have ultrasound too ? I was told mammogram in 6 months, now is 0.7 x 0.3 x 0.7 cm , they siad it's small
Posts.Title: waiting for core needle biopsy results 1 2

Posts.Content: Just a cup or two of coffee a day. Do they ever need to be removed ?
Posts.Title: waiting for core needle biopsy results 1 2

Posts.Content: I live in USA . I too have some cysts ( I was writing about them in another thread ). What kind a cysts do you have ? I have complicated ones, and actually I'm worried about them. And since everything was found this year ( the cluster of cysts, the complicated cysts and the fibroadenoma ) I was wondering if I had them maybe earlier and the 2D mammogram just didn't pick up any of it, and this year the 3D mammogram showed them ( 3D mammogram is a new mammogram with thomosynthesis, and it's a little better at showing things in dense breasts what I do have too ).

Posts.Title: waiting for core needle biopsy results 1 2

Posts.Content: Just want to update my situation, I got the results some 28 hours after the procedure, it's fibroadenoma. I was so relived that my gut was wrong ! That nurse who called me is an angel, because it wasn't her job at all to let me know the results, that's the nurse who was there with me at the biopsy, and she just called to see how am I doing, but she called the doctor first so that she can tell me the news.
Posts.Title: waiting for core needle biopsy results 1 2

Posts.Content: Every 3 years ? so you don't have a mammogram every year yet anyway ? and if you don't mind me asking are you on birth controll pills maybe ? I am , and somebody told me they may can make these things grow ? I'm 46 years old and been on BCP for the last 14 years.
Posts.Title: waiting for core needle biopsy results 1 2

Posts.Content: Yes there are simple cysts ( with fluid ) and complicated and complex cysts ( with fluid and some debris or other solid stuff ). They say simple cysts never go cancerous, but with these other ones there is a small chance, that's why I'm afraid. and as you said, they maybe hide some more problematic things. Was draining that cysts painful ? and how long did it take ?
Posts.Title: waiting for core needle biopsy results 1 2

Posts.Content: Had a mammogram for left breast pain, they called me back for a diagnostic mammog. for right breast tissue assymetry, had an ultrasound of the right breast, they saw a few cysts ( mammog. for those in 6 months maybe ) but they also said there is a very small mass which looks solid , so I should see a surgeon and have a core needle biopsy. I don't know any details, didn't ask anything about size or shape,etc. because I was scared already, and got shocked when the radiologist told me about the solid mass, because earlier the ultrasound tech. told me when I asked her what is she seeing, " I see cysts but I wouldn't worry about those ", she never mentioned the solid thing, so I thought there are cysts only. I have an app. with a surgeon in 3 days , but should i go for a second opinion before the biopsy ? thank you
Posts.Title: mammogram , ultrasound, biopsy ? should I ask for second opinion before the biopsy ?
